front.title: A YANG Data Model for Virtual Network (VN) Operations

abstract.t: A Virtual Network (VN) is a network provided by a service provider to a customer for the customer to use in any way it wants as though it were a physical network. This document provides a YANG data model generally applicable to any mode of VN operations. This includes VN operations as per the Abstraction and Control of TE Networks (ACTN) framework (RFC 8453).
